gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਪਤਿਬ੍ਰ ਤਾਕੳੁ ਪਵਿਤ੍ਰ ਘਰਿ ਵਾਤ ਨਾਤ ਅਸਨ ਬਸਨ ਧਨ ਧਾਮ ਲੋਗਚਾਰ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Patibr Taakau Pavitr Ghari Vaat Naata , Asan Basan Dhan Dhaam Logachaar Hai ?
translation: Just as living in her house, bathing, eating and sleeping etc. and discharging her worldly duties according to the social customs and traditions are all sacred for a faithful and loyal wife.

gurmukhi: ਤਾਤ ਮਾਤ ਭ੍ਰਾਤ ਸੁਤ ਸੁਜਨ ਕੁਟੰਬ ਸਖਾ ਸੇਵਾ ਗੁਰਜਨ ਸੁਖ ਅਭਰਨ ਸਿੰਗਾਰ ਹੈ
transliteration: Taat Maat Bhraat Sout Sujan Koutanb Sakhaa , Sayvaa Gurjan Soukh Abharan Singaar Hai ?
translation: It is her natural duty to embellish herself with ornaments for the happiness of her husband beside serving and respecting parents, brothers, sisters, sons, other elders in the family, friends and other social contacts.

gurmukhi: ਕਿਰਤ ਬਿਰਤ ਪਰਸੂਤ ਮਲ ਮੂਤ੍ਰਧਾਰੀ ਸਕਲ ਪਵਿਤ੍ਰ ਜੋੲੀ ਬਿਬਿਧਿ ਅਚਾਰ ਹੈ
transliteration: Kirat Birat Parasoot Mal Mootradhaaree , Sakal Pavitr Joee Bibidhi Achaar Hai ?
translation: Attending to the household chores, bearing children, bringing them up, keeping them clean and neat is all sacred for a faithful and loyal wife.

gurmukhi: ਤੈਸੇ ਗੁਰਸਿਖਨ ਕੳੁ ਲੇਪੁ ਨ ਗ੍ਹਿਸਤ ਮੈ ਅਾਨ ਦੇਵ ਸੇਵ ਧ੍ਰਿਗੁ ਜਨਮੁ ਸੰਸਾਰ ਹੈ ॥੪੮੩॥
transliteration: Taisay Gursikhan Kau Laypu N Grihasat Mai , Aan Dayv Sayv Dhrigu Janamu Sansaar Hai ?483?
translation: Similarly, the disciples of the Guru are never blemished while leading a householder's life. Like loyal and faithful wife, they consider indulgence of worship of any other god over the True Guru as a condemnable act in the world.  (483)
